prevalence_by_location(location, startswith)¶

outbreak_data.prevalence_by_location(location, startswith=None, server='api.outbreak.info', auth='Bearer 0ed52bbfb6c79d1fd8e9c6f267f9b6311c885a4c4c6f037d6ab7b3a40d586ad0')¶

Loads prevalence data from a location.

Parameters:

  • location (str) – (Required) A string

  • startswith (str) – (Optional) A string; loads data for all lineages beginning with first letter(s) of name

Returns:

A pandas DataFrame

Next topic
